channel.title: Demos on musing on github.io related to leaflet-map
channel.description: Recent content in Demos on musing on github.io related to leaflet-map

item.title: zero
item.description:
Demo Zero, copied from leaflet-map QuickStart Guide in README.md

  • leaflet-map on Github
  • map
    • uses branch

<html> <head> <script type="text/javascript" src="../../bower_components/webcomponentsjs/webcomponents-lite.js"></script> <link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/leaflet-map/leaflet-map.html"> <style> html, body { margin: 0; height: 100%; } leaflet-map { height: 100%; } </style> </head> <body> <leaflet-map fit-to-markers> <leaflet-marker longitude="77.2" latitude="28.4"> Marker I </leaflet-marker> <leaflet-marker longitude="77.3" latitude="28.5"> Marker I </leaflet-marker> <leaflet-circle longitude="77.2" latitude="28.4" radius="300"> Round </leaflet-circle> </leaflet-map> </body> </html>
